Package org.networkcalculus.dnc.curves

Interface Curve_Affine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Curve
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Curve_PwAffine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrivalCurve_Disco_Affine, ArrivalCurve_Disco_PwAffine, ArrivalCurve_MPARTC_PwAffine, Curve_Disco_Affine, Curve_Disco_PwAffine, Curve_MPARTC_PwAffine, MaxServiceCurve_Disco_Affine, MaxServiceCurve_Disco_PwAffine, MaxServiceCurve_MPARTC_PwAffine, ServiceCurve_Disco_Affine, ServiceCurve_Disco_PwAffine, ServiceCurve_MPARTC_PwAffine
    public interface Curve_Affine
extends Curve
    Interface for affine curves, including convenience functions used by Disco's implementation of DNC operations. I.e., in addition to its defining linear segments, curves may be ascribed as (compositions of) rate latency and token bucket functions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.networkcalculus.dnc.curves.Curve
